content: *this curly potato chip scarf makes up quickly lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 50193-1c *cmm-spiralscarf pdf* skill level easy a 790-335 homespun yarn prairie 1 ball b 510-201 moonlight mohair yarn rain forest 1 ball crochet hook - size p-15 10 mm scarf is worked lengthwise finished in 2 row first row is worked with 2 strands of a held together second row edging is worked with 1 strand of b see also spiral ruffled scarf knit 1 for the knit version 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/spiral-ruffled-scarf-knit
